item.title: Use tree command to list the structure
item.description: tree command is helping to show the structure of folders and files. Real Case When discussing the folder structure via video meeting, express the structure is a little bit challenge if we have a lot of levels and files. How to make the folder and file structure clear when we present something? . means in current dir. and we can use pwd to replace it. ➜ tree -a --dirsfirst . ├── test -> test_3 ├── test_1 │ └── file_1 ├── test_2 │ └── file_2 ├── test_3 │ └── file_3 └── .
